name: Neofusion Creative Foundation
website: D101, Shri Gopal Nagar, Gopal Pura Bypass, Jaipur- 302019
briefDescription: Name - Nanhe Pankh Unchi UdaanRight now this project is giving training and giving platform to underprivileged children of Jaipur area, where we are grooming 45 children in the field of art, theatre, music, literature. By our project we are going to decrease the rate of school dropouts and child labor issue.
